snippet.title: #DRIVE - Nintendo Switch Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
#DRIVE is an endless driving video game inspired by road and action movies from the 1970s. As simple as possible, allowing the player to pick a car, pick the place, and just hit the road. Just be aware not to hit anything else.

Nintendo Switch eShop: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/drive-switch/
Other Nintendo regions: https://www.drive.game/switch-links

Available on App Store, Google Play, and Nintendo eShop.

Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.pixelperfectdude.htdrive
App Store: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/drive/id1366180154 

Visit https://drive.game/ for more information or check out one of our social media profiles:
Twitter - https://twitter.com/drivethegame
Facebook - https://fb.com/drive.game
Instagram - https://instagram.com/drive.game
Discord - https://discord.gg/vhPRJm8agf
VK - https://vk.com/drive.game
Tiktok - https://www.tiktok.com/@drivethegame

Music composed and recorded by Daniel "Zoot" Bobrowski.
Writer and Director: Karol Miklas
Voice acting: George R. Ledoux
Video editing: Robert Bubel

© 2021 Pixel Perfect Dude, Lionsharp Studios.
